meanings.definition: The quality or state of being minute or small in size or importance.
meanings.sent1: The minutenesses of the tiny flower petals were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the minutenesses of the intricate jewelry design.
meanings.sent3: The minutenesses of the situation made everyone chuckle at the misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, the minutenesses of daily life can bring the most joy.
meanings.sent5: Her attention to the minutenesses of the painting revealed hidden beauty.

meanings.definition: The small or precise details or particulars of something.
meanings.sent1: He always pays attention to the minutenesses of his work to ensure perfection.
meanings.sent2: The detective noticed the minutenesses of the crime scene that others overlooked.
meanings.sent3: The minutenesses of the recipe were crucial for its success in the baking competition.
meanings.sent4: She captured the minutenesses of the landscape in her detailed sketches.
meanings.sent5: The minutenesses of the contract were carefully reviewed before signing.
